metadata.title: CVE-2019-11371 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: BWA (aka Burrow-Wheeler Aligner) 0.7.17 r1198 has a Buffer Overflow via along prefix that is mishandled in bns_fasta2bntseq and bns_dump atbtnseq.c.

criterions.comment: bwa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
